skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Gaze of Justice
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies 1 time. Has a 75% chance of decreasing the duration of all enemy buffs by 1 turn.
skills.name: Enforced Humility
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30%. Heals all allies by 25% of their MAX HP if they have less than 50% HP.
skills.name: Mentor of Heroes

skills.desc:
Revives all dead allies to 35% HP, then fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 20%.

Grants an Extra Turn to this Champion if an ally was successfully revived.
skills.name: Destiny's Call
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%
Lvl. 3 Cooldown -1Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +100%
